fields.name: name
fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: The label shown for this section in the Content Tree

fields.name: downloadfile
fields.label: Asset
fields.description: Allowed file types: Documents (pdf, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, ppt, pptx, txt, csv, xml), Images (jpg, jpeg, heic, png, webp, bmp), Videos (avs, acv, avc, ev, mp4), Archives (zip), Media (mp3, mov)

fields.description: Enter the iframe source URL

fields.description: Custom width in pixels (when using Custom aspect ratio)

fields.description: Custom height in pixels (when using Custom aspect ratio)

fields.description: The emphasis level of the card

fields.name: classes
fields.label: Style
fields.description: The style of the fragment

fields.name: classes
fields.label: Style
fields.description: The visual style of the quote

options.name: Solid
options.description: Solid dark teal background with white text

options.name: Outline Primary
options.description: Transparent background with medium teal outline and text

options.name: Outline Secondary
options.description: Transparent background with red/pink outline and text

fields.name: classes_size
fields.label: Quote Size
fields.description: The size of the quote text

options.name: Long
options.description: Smaller text size for longer quotes

fields.name: defaultLanguages
fields.label: Default Languages per Region (JSON)
fields.description: Override default language per region. Format: {"ch": "de", "de": "de"}

fields.name: folder
fields.label: Filter by Folder
fields.description: Filter results to show only pages from this folder path (e.g., /products or /blog). Leave empty to show all results. You can specify multiple folders separated by commas (e.g., /products, /blog).

fields.name: enableTagFilter
fields.label: Enable Tag Filter
fields.description: Show tag filter buttons based on page tags in search results. Users can filter results by clicking on tag pills.

fields.name: multipleTagSelect
fields.label: Allow Multiple Tag Selection
fields.description: When enabled, users can select multiple tags to filter results. When disabled, only one tag can be selected at a time.

fields.name: searchPlaceholder
fields.label: Search Placeholder
fields.description: Placeholder text shown in the search input field. Default: 'Search...'

fields.name: searchNoResultsFor
fields.label: No Results For Query
fields.description: Message shown in the count area when no results are found, followed by the search query. Default: 'No results found for'

fields.name: searchResultsTitle
fields.label: Search Results Title
fields.description: Title shown above the search results. Default: 'Search Results'

fields.name: autosuggest
fields.label: Toggle to turn recommended search
fields.description: Enable list of recommendations when user is typing in the search input. Default: ON (true).

fields.name: resultpage
fields.label: Result Page...
fields.description: Link to the search results page. When set, clicking the search icon or pressing Enter will navigate to this page with search results. This field is required when 'Toggle to turn recommended search' is disabled (false).

fields.name: searchPlaceholder
fields.label: Search Placeholder
fields.description: Placeholder text shown in the search input field. Default: 'Search...'

fields.name: searchNoResults
fields.label: No Results Message
fields.description: Message shown when no results are found. Default: 'No results found.'

fields.name: viewAllButtonText
fields.label: View All Results Button Text
fields.description: Text for the 'View all results' button shown when there are more than 6 results. Default: 'View all {count} results' (where {count} is replaced with the actual number of results).

fields.name: classes
fields.label: Style
fields.description: Style for the tabs (e.g., 'No Background', 'Background')

fields.name: title
fields.label: Tab Title
fields.description: Short descriptive title for the tab (e.g., 'Tab 1', 'Getting Started')

fields.name: content
fields.label: Tab Content
fields.description: Rich content displayed when tab is active (headings, paragraphs, lists, images, links)

fields.name: individual-pages-link
fields.label: Individual pages link
fields.description: Enter the paths of individual pages, without starting with a slash ('/').

fields.name: video
fields.label: Video
fields.description: Background video (MP4 format recommended) maximum time 2 minutes, 300 KB/s maximum size

fields.name: heading
fields.label: Heading
fields.description: Main heading text (use bold for accent color)

fields.name: subheading
fields.label: Subheading
fields.description: Optional subheading text

fields.name: badge
fields.label: Badge/Logo
fields.description: Optional badge or partner logo

fields.name: video-autoplay
fields.label: Autoplay
fields.description: Play video automatically when the page loads

fields.name: video-loop
fields.label: Loop
fields.description: Replay video automatically when finished

fields.name: video-muted
fields.label: Muted
fields.description: Mute video by default (required for autoplay in most browsers)

fields.name: video-controls
fields.label: Controls
fields.description: Show native video playback controls

fields.name: video-autoplay
fields.label: Autoplay
fields.description: Allows the video to play automatically

fields.name: video-loop
fields.label: Loop
fields.description: Allows video to replay automatically when finished

fields.name: video-muted
fields.label: Muted
fields.description: Allows video to be muted by default

fields.name: video-controls
fields.label: Controls
fields.description: Allows users to control the video playback
